description: Students apply theories and methods of culture studies to a selected major topic in American culture. The course employs a discussion format, focusing on critical reading, analytic essays. Recent topics include "Masculinity in America," "American Adolescence," and "Campus Ecology." The course is usually offered Spring Semester. May be repeated if topics are different.
name: Top: Reading Class
notes: Limitd to American Studies majors. All other students by consent of instructor only.
title: American Studies: A Topical Approach
